devdoc.details: This contract represents a company and its projects in a carbon market with enhanced security.

addCompany(address,string).details: Adds a new company to the carbon market with enhanced validation.
addCompany(address,string).return: The ID of the newly added company.

addProject(string,string,uint256,uint256.details: Adds a new project to the carbon market with enhanced validation.

params.carbonDioxideSaved: The amount of CO2 to be saved.
params.daystillCompletion: The number of days until project completion.

checkEXCListed(address,uint256,uint256).details: Checks if there are sufficient EXC (EcoXChange Tokens) listed for sale for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to check.

checkEXCListed(address,uint256,uint256).return: A boolean indicating whether there are sufficient EXC listed for sale for the project.

checkSufficientEXC(address,uint256,uint2.details: Checks if there are sufficient EXC (EcoXChange Tokens) for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to check.

checkSufficientEXC(address,uint256,uint2.return: A boolean indicating whether there are sufficient EXC for the project.

companyOwner(address,address).details: Checks that the calling address is the company itself trying to access its own information.
companyOwner(address,address).return: A boolean indicating whether the company has rights to view the company requested. (must be itself)

getCompanyEthBalance(address).details: Returns the ETH balance of a company.
getCompanyEthBalance(address).return: The ETH balance of the company.

getCompanyName(address).details: Returns the name of a specific company.

getEXCSold(uint256).details: Returns the amount of EXC sold for a project.
getEXCSold(uint256).return: The amount of EXC sold for the project.

getProjectState(uint256).details: Returns the state of a specific project.

getProjectexcAmount(uint256).details: Returns the excAmount of a specific project.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Get the admin role that controls a role

getStakedCredits(address,uint256).details: Returns the staked credits for a project.
getStakedCredits(address,uint256).return: The amount of staked credits for the project.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grant a role to an account

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Check if an account has a specific role

listEXC(address,uint256,uint256).details: Lists EXC (EcoXChange Tokens) for sale for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to list for sale.

projectCompanyOwner(uint256,address).details: Checks if a project is owned by a specific company.
projectCompanyOwner(uint256,address).return: A boolean indicating whether the project is owned by the company.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Renounce a role (caller renounces their own role)

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revoke a role from an account

sellEXC(address,uint256,uint256).details: Sells EXC (EcoXChange Tokens) for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to sell.

setEXCListed(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the amount of listed EXC for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to set.

setEXCSold(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the amount of sold EXC for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to set.

setProjectStateComplete(uint256).details: Sets a project state to complete.

setProjectexcAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the amount of EXC for a project.

params.excAmt: The amount of EXC to set.

params.credits: The amount of credits to stake.

devdoc.title: Company
